objects.specification: A seamless floor surface painted in a light pastel tone with a subtle matte finish, simulating a polished woodgrain or laminate texture. The surface is uniformly smooth with fine linear details to evoke warmth and spaciousness, contributing to a bright and inviting atmosphere.

A smooth vertical wall panel painted in a light neutral tone with a uniform matte finish. The wall is minimalistic, providing a clean backdrop for mounted items, with crisp edges and seamless corners.

A smooth vertical wall panel painted in a light neutral tone with a uniform matte finish. The wall is minimalistic, providing a clean backdrop for mounted items, with crisp edges and seamless corners.

A smooth vertical wall panel painted in a light neutral tone with a uniform matte finish. The wall is minimalistic, providing a clean backdrop for mounted items, with crisp edges and seamless corners.

A smooth vertical wall panel painted in a light neutral tone with a uniform matte finish. The wall is minimalistic, providing a clean backdrop for mounted items, with crisp edges and seamless corners.
A flat ceiling surface painted in a matching light neutral color with a smooth matte finish. The ceiling is simple and unobtrusive, providing a bright overhead plane with minimal detailing.

A large rectangular teacher desk crafted from dark-stained wood with a rich walnut grain finish. It features clean edges, sturdy legs, and a subtle modesty panel. The tabletop is polished with beveled edges, evoking a professional and functional aesthetic.

An executive-style teacher chair upholstered in a deep complementary color with padded seat and backrest. It has a sleek metal frame, adjustable height mechanism, and curved lumbar support, offering an ergonomic and refined look.

A large rectangular blackboard with a dark matte writing surface and a slim metal frame. The texture holds chalk cleanly, and the minimal frame provides a classic functional appearance for instructional use.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a smooth white plastic casing, rounded edges, subtle vents, and a front-facing lens. Its minimal modern design blends unobtrusively with the ceiling plane.

A tall bookshelf made of medium-tone wood with visible grain, containing multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover books of various colors and sizes. The design is simple and contemporary with clean lines.
A round wall clock with a white face, black hour markers, and slender black hands. The thin metallic casing offers a minimalist and easily readable design.

A decorative potted plant with lush green variegated foliage and broad leaves, housed in a simple neutral-toned cylindrical pot with a matte finish. The leaves have a natural sheen, adding an organic accent.

A decorative potted plant with lush green variegated foliage and broad leaves, housed in a simple neutral-toned cylindrical pot with a matte finish. The leaves have a natural sheen, adding an organic accent.
A large rectangular window with clear glass pane set in a slim metallic frame, offering unobstructed daylight. The design is modern and minimalistic.
Soft opaque drapery in a pastel hue, hanging in gentle folds from a slim rod. The fabric has a slight sheen and clean hems, reaching slightly below the windowsill.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of matte plastic with a slightly flared rim. The design is plain and unobtrusive, ideal for paper disposal.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of matte plastic with a slightly flared rim. The design is plain and unobtrusive, ideal for paper disposal.

A medium-sized student desk with a light-colored wood laminated surface, rounded corners, and subtle woodgrain texture. Supported by slender metal legs in a complementary neutral tone, the design is simple, modern, and functional.
